ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cut a pocket horizontally into the thickest part of each chicken breast without cutting all the way through
Stuff chicken evenly and secure with toothpicks if needed to prevent filling from escaping
Cook bacon until crispy first, then crumble and add to the cheese filling for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through butterflying the chicken, preparing the bacon-cheddar filling, and air frying until the chicken is cooked through and filling is melted.
